survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and attitudes toward sustainable packaging in the retail sector.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when making a purchase?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure importance. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when making a purchase?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with checkboxes and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for products with sustainable packaging?
answer_options: Yes, but only a small amount more
No, I would not pay more
questions.client_notes: Use clear, distinct options to gauge willingness to pay.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for products with sustainable packaging?
answer_options: Yes, but only a small amount more
No, I would not pay more

questions.question_text: What factors influence your preference for sustainable packaging? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with checkboxes and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influence your preference for sustainable packaging? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you actively seek out products with sustainable packaging?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to measure behavior.

script.question_text: How often do you actively seek out products with sustainable packaging?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when trying to purchase products with sustainable packaging?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a text input field.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when trying to purchase products with sustainable packaging?

questions.question_text: Which of the following industries do you believe should prioritize sustainable packaging the most? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize industries. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with checkboxes (max 3 selections) and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following industries do you believe should prioritize sustainable packaging the most? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How do you typically dispose of sustainable packaging after use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question with radio buttons and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How do you typically dispose of sustainable packaging after use?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in sustainable packaging?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a text input field.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in sustainable packaging?

questions.question_text: Have you ever chosen not to purchase a product because it did not have sustainable packaging?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge behavior.

script.question_text: Have you ever chosen not to purchase a product because it did not have sustainable packaging?
